Lost in space?

 First of all, if you haven't read Leaving Earth rulebook, go do it now and then come back here. Basically this application is a digital version of the mission tables illustrated in the rulebook, but with some nice automations to help you.
 As the first thing, you want to create a mission, from "Command Center" view using the floating button. Then choose a mission name, it can either be something that reminds what the goal is, like "Man to Moon" or some fancy and secret name if you fear other space agencies espionage, like "Seeliger Effect". You'll see some information about the mission, the most important one is the total cost that will be auto-calculated for you.
 Now the next step is to add mission stages, just like the rulebook explains, in reverse order. This will make mission planning easier.
